title: Contemporary Melbourne Moonee Ponds Self-Contained Apartment Escape with Onsite Restaurant
description:
Savour the perfect blend of contemporary style and classic Melbourne charm at this apartment retreat, ensconced in the heart of vibrant Moonee Ponds. Take advantage of the hotel's location with the lush Queens Park, the Puckle Street retail and dining precinct and the Maribyrnong River Trail nearby. Plus, the Melbourne Zoo and the bustling CBD are within a 15-minute drive.

Feel right at home in the well-appointed apartments, featuring full kitchens. If you don't want to cook, you can make your way to the onsite Saros Bar & Dining and indulge in the New York-style atmosphere while tucking into Mediterranean-inspired dishes paired with premium wines and spirits.
offer_address: 41 Homer Street, Moonee Ponds, Victoria 3039, Australia
